activities.name: Cannes Film Festival
activities.description: Experience the world's most prestigious film festival as the city transforms with red carpets, celebrity sightings, and cinematic celebrations along La Croisette.
activities.seasonal_notes: The festival typically runs for two weeks in May, bringing global attention and glamour to Cannes.
activities.booking_tips: Unless you're industry-accredited, enjoy the public screenings at Cinéma de la Plage (beach cinema) which are free but require advance online registration.

activities.name: Forville Market Flower Stalls
activities.description: Visit the vibrant Marché Forville in spring when the flower stalls burst with color and local Provençal produce is at its freshest.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring brings an abundance of local flowers, strawberries, asparagus, and early cherries to this historic market.
activities.booking_tips: Visit before 10am for the best selection and most pleasant shopping experience. Closed on Mondays.

activities.name: Yacht Show at Vieux Port
activities.description: Explore the MIPIM or Cannes Yachting Festival (depending on exact timing) showcasing spectacular vessels in the city's picturesque Old Port.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring brings the first major boating events of the season with pleasant temperatures ideal for harbor strolls.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online in advance and wear comfortable shoes as there's considerable walking involved.

activities.name: Gardens of Villa Rothschild
activities.description: Explore the stunning gardens of Villa Ephrussi de Rothschild in nearby Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat, featuring nine themed gardens in full spring bloom.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring is the optimal time to visit when roses, rare plants, and Mediterranean species are displaying their best colors.
activities.booking_tips: Combine with a tour of the villa itself and plan at least 2-3 hours for the visit. Easily accessible by train and bus from Cannes.

activities.name: Picnic on Lérins Islands
activities.description: Take a short ferry ride to the peaceful Lérins Islands and enjoy a springtime picnic surrounded by pine forests, historic monasteries, and Mediterranean views.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring offers mild temperatures perfect for island exploration before the summer crowds arrive.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase ferry tickets in advance from the kiosks at Cannes harbor and bring your own picnic supplies from Forville Market.

activities.name: MIDEM Music Conference
activities.description: Experience the world's leading music industry event featuring live performances, industry talks, and musical discoveries across various venues.
activities.seasonal_notes: This spring event brings together music professionals from around the world with opportunities to discover new artists.
activities.booking_tips: While primarily an industry event, look for public concert series and performances associated with the conference.

activities.name: Hike the Esterel Massif
activities.description: Explore the dramatic red rock landscapes of the Esterel Massif with its striking contrast against the blue Mediterranean, covered in spring wildflowers.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring brings perfect hiking weather and blooming maquis shrubland, with stunning displays of wildflowers along the coastal paths.
activities.booking_tips: Start early to avoid midday heat, wear sturdy shoes, and bring plenty of water. The Sentier du Littoral (coastal path) offers spectacular views.

activities.name: Cooking Class at Château de la Napoule
activities.description: Learn Provençal spring cuisine in a hands-on cooking class at the medieval Château de la Napoule, followed by lunch in the seaside gardens.
activities.seasonal_notes: Classes focus on seasonal spring ingredients like artichokes, asparagus, and early herbs from the château's gardens.
activities.booking_tips: Book at least two weeks in advance as classes are small and fill quickly. Classes include château tour and wine pairing.

activities.name: International Games Festival
activities.description: Participate in the International Games Festival, where board games, card games, role-playing games, and video games take over the Palais des Festivals.
activities.seasonal_notes: This February/March event brings together game enthusiasts of all ages with tournaments, demonstrations, and new releases.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase day passes online before arriving and plan your schedule around specific tournament times or demonstrations.

activities.name: Beach Club Day at La Croisette
activities.description: Experience the glamorous Cannes beach scene by spending a day at one of the luxurious private beach clubs along La Croisette, complete with sunbeds, service, and Mediterranean swimming.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer is peak beach season in Cannes with warm waters and vibrant atmosphere at these iconic establishments.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve sunbeds at least a day in advance, especially on weekends. Consider morning reservations as prices are sometimes lower before noon.

activities.name: Bastille Day Fireworks
activities.description: Witness one of France's most spectacular Bastille Day fireworks displays over the Bay of Cannes on July 14th, viewed best from La Croisette or the beach.
activities.seasonal_notes: This patriotic celebration brings locals and visitors together for music, festivities, and world-class pyrotechnics over the sea.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive several hours early to secure a good viewing spot along the coast and bring a picnic to enjoy while waiting.

activities.name: Jazz Festival at Antibes Juan-les-Pins
activities.description: Attend Europe's oldest jazz festival in nearby Antibes Juan-les-Pins, featuring world-class musicians performing in an open-air seaside setting.
activities.seasonal_notes: This July festival takes advantage of warm summer evenings with performances under the stars by the Mediterranean.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets for headline acts well in advance and consider the multi-day passes for better value.

activities.name: Sailing Lesson in the Bay
activities.description: Take sailing lessons in the Bay of Cannes, learning to navigate the Mediterranean waters with views of the Esterel mountains and the Lérins Islands.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer provides ideal sailing conditions with reliable winds in the mornings and calm, warm waters.
activities.booking_tips: Book a beginner's course at École de Voile or opt for a private lesson. Reserve at least a week ahead during peak season.

activities.name: Open-Air Cinema at Cinéma de la Plage
activities.description: Enjoy classic and contemporary films screened directly on the beach as part of the unique Cinéma de la Plage experience during summer evenings.
activities.seasonal_notes: These special screenings run throughout summer, offering the magical experience of watching films with your feet in the sand.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive at least an hour early to secure a beach chair, or bring your own blanket to sit on the sand. Registration may be required online.

activities.name: Pyrotechnic Art Festival
activities.description: Experience the Festival d'Art Pyrotechnique, an international fireworks competition where countries compete to create the most spectacular display over the Bay of Cannes.
activities.seasonal_notes: Several nights throughout July and August feature these breathtaking displays choreographed to music.
activities.booking_tips: For the best views, reserve a table at a waterfront restaurant well in advance or find a spot on the beaches away from La Croisette.

activities.name: Sunset Dinner Cruise to Saint-Tropez
activities.description: Embark on a luxury evening cruise from Cannes to Saint-Tropez, enjoying dinner onboard while watching the sunset over the French Riviera coastline.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer evenings offer perfect conditions for coastal cruising with spectacular sunset views and warm sea breezes.
activities.booking_tips: Book at least a week in advance and check if the cruise includes return transportation or if you'll need to arrange your own way back.

activities.name: Explore the Underwater World at Îles de Lérins
activities.description: Discover the protected marine environment around the Lérins Islands through snorkeling or scuba diving, exploring Mediterranean marine life in crystal-clear waters.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer water temperatures are perfect for extended water activities, with optimal visibility in the mornings.
activities.booking_tips: Book guided snorkeling tours or PADI diving experiences through certified centers in Cannes. Beginners are welcome for introductory dives.

activities.name: Musée de la Castre Summer Exhibition
activities.description: Visit the special summer exhibition at the Musée de la Castre, housed in a medieval castle atop Le Suquet, offering both cultural exhibits and panoramic city views.
activities.seasonal_notes: The museum often hosts special exhibitions during summer months, providing a cultural respite from the beach scene.
activities.booking_tips: Visit in the afternoon when temperatures peak for a cool cultural break, and don't miss the tower climb for spectacular views.

activities.name: Royal Regatta of Cannes
activities.description: Watch the majestic classic yachts compete in the Régates Royales, a prestigious sailing event attracting vintage vessels from around the world to Cannes harbor.
activities.seasonal_notes: This September event features perfect sailing conditions with reliable winds and fewer crowds than summer months.
activities.booking_tips: View the races for free from coastal paths or book a spectator boat to get closer to the action on the water.

activities.name: Truffle Hunting in Provence
activities.description: Join a guided truffle hunting expedition in the nearby Provence countryside, followed by a truffle-focused meal showcasing this autumn delicacy.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn marks the beginning of black truffle season in the region, a highlight for culinary enthusiasts.
activities.booking_tips: Book through a specialized tour operator at least two weeks in advance and wear comfortable shoes for walking through forests and farmland.

activities.name: MIPCOM Audiovisual Content Market
activities.description: Experience the energy of the world's entertainment content market, with industry professionals, screenings, and events throughout Cannes.
activities.seasonal_notes: This October event brings television and digital content professionals to Cannes with a busy schedule of presentations and networking.
activities.booking_tips: While primarily an industry event, look for public screenings and talks that might be accessible without accreditation.

activities.name: Autumn Wine Tasting in Bellet
activities.description: Visit the nearby Bellet wine region for autumn tastings of this rare appellation, enjoying the vineyard views and harvest atmosphere.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is harvest season, offering the unique opportunity to see wine production firsthand while enjoying the colors of fall in the vineyards.
activities.booking_tips: Book a guided tour with transportation from Cannes or rent a car to visit multiple vineyards in one day.

activities.name: Mushroom Foraging in the Esterel
activities.description: Join expert guides for a mushroom foraging expedition in the Esterel Massif, learning to identify edible varieties like cèpes and chanterelles.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn rains create perfect conditions for wild mushrooms in the forests surrounding Cannes.
activities.booking_tips: Always go with licensed guides who know safe foraging locations and can identify edible species with certainty.

activities.name: Les Concerts de Midi at Eglise Notre Dame d'Espérance
activities.description: Experience the lunchtime concert series at the historic church in Le Suquet, featuring chamber music and soloists in an intimate setting.
activities.seasonal_notes: The autumn concert season offers high-quality performances in a beautiful setting away from the summer crowds.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive 20 minutes early to secure seating as these popular concerts operate on a first-come basis.

activities.name: Pottery Workshop in Vallauris
activities.description: Take a hands-on pottery class in nearby Vallauris, famous for its ceramic traditions and as Picasso's pottery workshop location.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is perfect for creative indoor activities, and many studios offer special workshops during this quieter season.
activities.booking_tips: Book at least a week in advance and inquire about shipping options for your creations if you can't take them home immediately.

activities.name: Autumn Walks in La Croix des Gardes Forest
activities.description: Explore the urban forest park of La Croix des Gardes with its autumn colors, panoramic viewpoints, and peaceful walking trails above the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings cooler temperatures perfect for hiking and photography, with fewer visitors than summer months.
activities.booking_tips: Access is free and no booking is required. The western entrance near Boulevard Leader provides the easiest starting point.

activities.name: MAPIC Retail Real Estate Market
activities.description: Experience the international retail property market event, showcasing innovations in shopping, urban planning, and retail concepts.
activities.seasonal_notes: This November event brings retail professionals to Cannes with exhibitions and trend presentations.
activities.booking_tips: This is primarily an industry event requiring professional registration, but the surrounding activities in Cannes offer insights into retail trends.

activities.name: Christmas Village at Allées de la Liberté
activities.description: Experience the charm of the Cannes Christmas Village with its traditional wooden chalets offering festive foods, crafts, and holiday decorations.
activities.seasonal_notes: December brings a magical atmosphere to Cannes with lights, decorations, and seasonal specialties throughout the city center.
activities.booking_tips: Visit in the evening when the light displays are most impressive and try the regional holiday specialties like vin chaud (mulled wine).

activities.name: New Year's Eve Fireworks on the Bay
activities.description: Celebrate New Year's Eve with Cannes' spectacular midnight fireworks display over the Bay, viewed best from La Croisette or the beaches.
activities.seasonal_notes: The city puts on an impressive display to welcome the New Year, with restaurants offering special celebration menus.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve a table at a waterfront restaurant months in advance for prime viewing with dinner, or join the public celebration along the beaches.

activities.name: International Games Festival
activities.description: Participate in the Festival International des Jeux, Europe's largest gaming event featuring board games, card games, role-playing games, and tournaments.
activities.seasonal_notes: This February event brings together game enthusiasts with opportunities to try new releases and meet designers.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase day passes online before arriving and download the event app to plan your schedule around specific tournament times.

activities.name: Mimosa Route Tour
activities.description: Explore the famous 'Route du Mimosa,' an 8-stage scenic route showcasing the bright yellow mimosa flowers that bloom in winter along the French Riviera.
activities.seasonal_notes: January through March is mimosa season, when these vibrant flowers create a stunning contrast against the winter landscape.
activities.booking_tips: Rent a car or join an organized tour from Cannes. The route runs from Bormes-les-Mimosas to Grasse with several charming villages along the way.

activities.name: Cooking Class at Les Apprentis Gourmets
activities.description: Learn to prepare Provençal winter specialties in a hands-on cooking class focused on seasonal ingredients and traditional techniques.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter classes focus on hearty Provençal dishes like daube (beef stew), bouillabaisse, and seasonal desserts.
activities.booking_tips: Classes are small and fill quickly, so book at least two weeks in advance. Morning classes typically include lunch with wine pairings.

activities.name: Day Trip to Monaco Monte-Carlo
activities.description: Take a winter day trip to Monaco to visit the famous Monte-Carlo Casino, the exotic gardens, and the Prince's Palace with fewer tourists than peak season.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter offers the advantage of exploring this glamorous destination without crowds, with mild Mediterranean weather still pleasant for walking.
activities.booking_tips: Take the train from Cannes for the scenic coastal route or join an organized tour that includes transportation and guided visits.

activities.name: Spa Day at Thermes Marins
activities.description: Indulge in a luxurious spa experience at one of Cannes' premier wellness centers, enjoying treatments that utilize local ingredients like sea salt and lavender.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is ideal for spa treatments and wellness retreats, with many hotels offering special packages during this quieter season.
activities.booking_tips: Book signature treatments at least a week in advance and arrive early to enjoy the facilities like saunas, pools, and relaxation areas.

activities.name: Art Galleries in Le Suquet
activities.description: Explore the art galleries of Old Town Cannes, discovering local artists and international works in a peaceful winter atmosphere.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter offers a more relaxed experience for art appreciation without the summer crowds, and galleries often hold special exhibitions during this season.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required for most galleries. Consider joining a guided art walk for insights into the local creative scene.

activities.name: MIDEM Winter Edition
activities.description: Experience the winter edition of the international music market, featuring industry conferences, showcase performances, and networking events.
activities.seasonal_notes: This industry event brings music professionals together with opportunities to discover new artists and trends.
activities.booking_tips: While primarily for industry professionals, look for associated public concerts and events that may be accessible without accreditation.
